Shaders

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shaders.ShaderProgram
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StaticShader, TerrainShader

    public abstract class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    This is class template used to create shader programs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShaderProgram(java.lang.String vertexFile, java.lang.String fragmentFile)
      This method creates shader program by attaching vertex shader and fragment shader

      • ShaderProgram

        public ShaderProgram(java.lang.String vertexFile,
                     java.lang.String fragmentFile)
        This method creates shader program by attaching vertex shader and fragment shader
        Parameters:
        vertexFile - file from which vertex shader is loaded
        fragmentFile - file from which fragment shader is loaded
